mapper.select: SELECT sum(real_amount_total) as totalSumRealAmout, sum(notax_real_amount_total) as totalSumNotaxRealAmount, sum(tax_amount_total) as totalSumTaxAmount from saas_distr_out a

where.if: and ( c.code like CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') or c.barcode like CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') or c.name like CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') or c.generic_name like CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') or c.approval_number like CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') )

mapper.select: select count(1) from saas_distr_out a INNER join saas_distr_out_detail b on b.out_id=a.id INNER join saas_distr_out_shelf f on f.dtl_id=b.id INNER join saas_goods c on c.id=b.goods_id INNER join saas_enterprise d on d.id=a.enterprise_id INNER join saas_goods_category e on e.id=c.category_id
mapper.delete: DELETE from saas_distr_out where id = #{id} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(real_amount_total) AS totalSumRealAmout, sum(notax_real_amount_total) AS totalSumNotaxRealAmount, sum(tax_amount_total) AS totalSumTaxAmount FROM saas_distr_out WHERE enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
